Tonga: The Ha'amonga 'a Maui was built during the rule of Tuʻi Tonga Tu'itatui.
Singapore: The Kingdom of Singapura is founded by Sang Nila Utama, a prince of Srivijaya.
Philippine: The Rajahnate of Cebu was founded after the rebellion of Sri Lumay against the Maharajah of Chola Dynasty had succeeded.
The Residents of Mandaluyong have always been known for their industry. Men did the laundry to the amusement of non-residents until shortly after the war, while the women ironed the clothes.
Indonesia: Islam is thought to have become established in the Aceh region.
Aji Batara Agung Dewa Sakti founded Sultanate of Kutai in the Tepian Batu or Kutai Lama.
